heroSection.description: A modern walk-in shower with beige tile walls, a built-in bench, and a sleek glass door, showcasing the company's expertise in bathroom remodeling and design.
heroSection.callToAction: Transform your bathroom into a luxurious oasis with our expert design and installation services.

heroSection.description: A beautifully tiled shower with a marble-like finish, featuring a rainfall showerhead and a niche for storage, highlighting the company's attention to detail and high-quality workmanship.
heroSection.callToAction: Elevate your shower experience with our custom tile work and premium fixtures.

heroSection.description: A stunning freestanding bathtub with a modern faucet, set against a backdrop of marble-like tiles, demonstrating the company's ability to create spa-like bathroom retreats.
heroSection.callToAction: Indulge in the ultimate relaxation with our luxurious bathtub installations.

aboutUsSection.description: A residential plumbing project showcasing the installation of new pipes and fixtures, highlighting the company's expertise in both residential and commercial plumbing services.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image demonstrates the company's capabilities in handling various plumbing projects, from new installations to renovations, making it suitable for the About Us section.

aboutUsSection.description: A tankless water heater installation, showcasing the company's proficiency in providing energy-efficient and space-saving solutions for hot water needs.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image highlights the company's commitment to offering modern and sustainable plumbing solutions, which can be a key selling point in the About Us section.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: James Renfroe
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Came out replaced Flange,great plumber & helper!Our new go to plumber
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Frankie Cousin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Workers were courteous. They had to replace a faulty water heater but they tried to fix the problem before replacing it. Great service and prompt service.

However later I had much difficulty trying to get a simple detailed invoice. I needed it for insurance purposes. Now I feel I have lost my money. Shouldn't companies have company invoices?
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jeanette Tetreau
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We called Mr. Huff and he had two other jobs scheduled that day  but told us when he finished those jobs he would try to give an hour notice before arrival. It was the same day and he repaired the leak. Hopefully we will not have other problems in the future, but we will definitely call Mr. Huff for our plumbing issues.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Meka
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I heard great things about this company and I also read the great reviews. Andrew was as nice on the phone as he was in person. He is very down to earth, humble, personable, and professional. He was on time and went straight to work to figure out the issue. He did a good job,  provided a fair price and I would recommend him to anyone. Thanks Andrew!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review about your experience with me.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Amy Kissic
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I called him about my problem and he came out the next day to fix a leaky pipe. He was very professional and affordable. Would definitely use him again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kayla Holmes
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: He was so prompt and courteous. Once he was able to come out, he fixed the problem within a few hours. Other plumbers would not come out, or had quoted me thousands of dollars worth of work. Mr. Huff had my house working again for a reasonable rate, and wishing a fantastic time frame. Very professional, highly recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: PAt Williams
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Thank you H and C Plumbing for a job well done. Andrew been doing our repairs for years and has never disappointed.  If you want a job well done with curtious  service call H and C Plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Mrs Williams for the review. I am glad you noted our relationship and your experience with us along with the quality of the work we perform. Thanks again, Andrew Huff.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Wilson Crumbley
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I have known Andrew Huff for many years now, even worked with him. He is the most genuine man you can find to do all your plumbing needs. He is organized and does his best to provide everyone with professional help. He treats everyone equal and loves his job. I want to add as well that he is a very Godly man. Keep up the good work Andrew!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the encouragement Lee. It good to have a friend that will share his thoughts.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Courtney Chapman
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Mrs Chapman for taking the time to rate the business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Taylor Jenkins
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Hello Taylor Jenkins, we are sorry you had a bad experience with a service company. We have no records for you in our system and believe that you may have accidentally rated the wrong business. Feel free to message or call if there is any way we can help clear up the issue. Thank you, H and C Plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Pressley
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Mrs. Presley, we are sorry that you had a bad experience with a service company. We do not have any records of you in our system and believe that you may have accidentally rated the wrong business. Feel free to message or call if there is any way we can help clear up the situation. Thank you, H and C Plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Mr. Clemment, we are sorry you had a bad experience with a service company. We have no records for you in our system and believe that you may have accidentally rated the wrong business. Feel free to message or call if there is any way we can help clear up the issue. Thank you, H and C Plumbing.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kevin Lynch
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great plumber, great guy. Very knowledgeable on all things plumbing. Even let me take a shower at their house after Zeta left us without power a few days. Thank you Andrew!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Laura Fordham
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Diligent young man. Arrives when he says he will be on site and communicates well. Quality work. RE-configured two bathrooms for us during remodel including adding a shower. It was a difficult reconfiguration with much floor tear out. Andrew left it with all flooring replaced and site clean. Larry Fordham.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Scott Edwards
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great to see younger generation starting businesses and doing their job right. On time nice and clean:
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the review and noticing what qualities drives our business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mary Crist
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Andrew is amazing!! We will definitely use him.for our plumbing needs!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Susan Wilder
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for taking the time to post your rating.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: diane ragland
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Excellent service. Always fixes what is broken.Reasonable prices also. Very pleased with the work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for your rating and review. I know someone will find it useful.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: ashley cabaniss
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Has plumbed three houses for me and helped several friend out with problems. Always been someone I could count on and recommend with out any doubt.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Ashley for the response. I am pleased to see your response and hope that I always meet your expectations. Thank you for your business.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Felecia Edwards
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I have had the opportunity to experience his work first hand and I have always been very pleased with the work done and services provided in a timely manner. I highly recommend this service if you need good work done!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Mrs. Edwards for your review. I am glad you have been "very pleased" with my work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Frank Webb
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: H and C Plumbing is a top quality business. They are my go to Plummer. I have use them several times and very satisfied with their response and work ethics.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for your rating and review. I am glad to be able to do satisfactory work and look forward to helping you in the future.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: H and C Plumbing LLC

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about H and C Plumbing LLC, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: While the specific license details are not provided in the sources, it is mentioned that businesses in this industry may require professional licensing, bonding, or registration. For plumbing services, registration with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board is typically required[4].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: H and C Plumbing LLC is located at 181 Appletree Rd, Goodwater, AL 35072. They serve the surrounding areas, including residential and commercial clients[3].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The business operates from 7:00 AM to an unspecified closing time, Monday through Friday. It is closed on Saturdays and Sundays. The payment methods are not specified in the available sources[3].
- **Years in Operation**: H and C Plumbing LLC was formed in March 2019, so as of 2025, it has been in operation for approximately 6 years[3].

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: H and C Plumbing LLC provides a range of services including repairing or changing out faucets, toilets, water heaters, addressing water leaks, and handling plugged septic lines. They also perform new construction work for both residential and commercial clients[3].
- **Service Areas Covered**: They serve the surrounding areas of Goodwater, AL, including residential and commercial properties[3].
- **Emergency Service Availability**: While it is not explicitly stated that they offer emergency services, a customer review mentions that the owner, Mr. Huff, repaired a leak on the same day he was called, indicating some level of prompt service availability[3].
- **Prices or Rates**: There is no specific pricing or rate information provided in the sources.

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: Customers have praised the business for its courteous workers, prompt service, and dedication to quality work. For example, one customer appreciated that the plumber tried to fix a faulty water heater before replacing it, and another customer was satisfied with the same-day repair of a leak[3].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: There is no BBB rating or status mentioned for H and C Plumbing LLC in the provided sources. The business profile on Birdeye does not indicate any BBB accreditation[3].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Customers frequently mention the courteous and prompt service, as well as the quality of the work performed[3].
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews.

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**: The business is owned by Mr. Huff, though his full name is not specified in the sources provided[3].
- **Staff Qualifications**: There is no detailed information available on the staff qualifications or professional certifications of the employees at H and C Plumbing LLC[3].
- **Professional Certifications**: While not explicitly stated, it is implied that the business would need to comply with state licensing requirements for plumbers, which involves professional certifications[4].
aboutUs: H and C Plumbing LLC is a trusted local plumbing company serving the Goodwater, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in residential and commercial plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to new construction projects. We take pride in our expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to delivering top-notch workmanship on every job.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a reliable and knowledgeable plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Prompt and courteous service, with a focus on addressing your needs efficiently and effectively.
Comprehensive solutions tailored to your specific plumbing requirements, whether it's a minor repair or a major installation.
Meticulous attention to detail and a dedication to quality workmanship, ensuring long-lasting results you can trust.
